Author: MSplinterED
Text: In treatment in always being told to "be nice to yourself"  For some reason it's easier that way. Like binging and purging is mean to my body. Recovery is practice in being kind. I have always tried my best to be a nice person. I'm not always perfect though

Author: fat_cacao
Text: I totally relate to this :/. I also think that all of my friends are beautiful regardless of their weight or body shape, but can't extend that same view to myself at all.
